body:
@jart I agree that bash is much more convenient, the problem is that not all OSs have it. I checked the style guide, and it looks like there are exceptions (like Solaris) 😉 

I think replacing the `configure` with py script would be fine. Or [`autoconf` flow](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Autoconf#/media/File:Autoconf-automake-process.svg) could be written.
